name: RecordTypeInfo

methods.name: getDeveloperName
methods.description: Returns the developer name for this record type.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the UI label of this record type. The label can be translated into any language that Salesforce supports.

methods.name: getRecordTypeId
methods.description: Returns the ID of this record type.

methods.name: isActive
methods.description: Returns true if this record type is active, false otherwise.

methods.name: isAvailable
methods.description: Returns true if this record type is available to the current user, false otherwise. Use this method to display a list of available record types to the user when he or she is creating a new record.

methods.name: isDefaultRecordTypeMapping
methods.description: Returns true if this is the default record type for the user, false otherwise.

methods.name: isMaster
methods.description: Returns true if this is the master record type and false otherwise. The master record type is the default record type thatâ€™s used when a record has no custom record type associated with it.

description: Contains methods for accessing record type information for an sObject with associated record types.
